abstract: A new feature to Google’s cellphone mapping service can figure out more or less sort of where you are. It’s got some slick technology to help it figure that out.
snippet: A new feature to Google’s cellphone mapping service can figure out more or less sort of where you are. It’s got some slick technology to help it figure that out.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE: See comment from Google at the end.

headline.main: Google Doesn’t Know Where You Are (But It Has a Good Guess)
